text: E40 may refer to: * Nimzo-Indian Defense, Encyclopaedia of Chess Openings code * European route E40, a road extending from France to Kazakhstan * E-40 (born 1967), American rapper * GE E40, a locomotive * E40, the name for the fuel blend of 40% ethanol and 60% gasoline * E40 screw, a type of Edison screw * HMS E40, a 1916 British E class submarine
title: E40
